Name: Over City
About the game: 'Over City' is a vertical scrolling flying shooting game, jointly developed by independent game producers ying liu and nan yu, and published by heiheigame. In the game 'Sky Reaper', players will control different planes to fight over the city. The difficulty of the game will gradually increase with the level, and it is definitely not an easy task to pass the level. 【Game Features】 Each aircraft has three different means of attack 1: Basic attack 2: Charge attack 3: bomb attack The power of the basic attack and the charged attack is related to the player's current firepower value. After destroying a specific enemy, the player can eat the blue [Power Up], which can be eaten up to 4 times. The power of the bombs is constant, and players can also obtain additional bombs by destroying certain enemies.
